column4: 2015 john passed away at the age of 63 after a brief illness with acute myeloid leukemia (aml) on june 12
column5: 2015. john served in the u. s. navy and then civil service as a welder. he was a huge giants and indy car fan. he is survived by his daughter
column9: dede ink; 4 grandchildren and a host of extended family and friends. per johns wishes
column10: there will be no funeral service. john will be greatly missed. in lieu of flowers
